name: Ant-Man
stars: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas, Corey Stoll, Evangeline Lilly
short_description: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
short_description: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's Mightiest Heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.

name: Batman
stars: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger, Robert Wuhl
short_description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.

name: Batman Begins
stars: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe, Liam Neeson
short_description: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

name: Captain America: The First Avenger
stars: Chris Evans, Hugo Weaving, Samuel L. Jackson, Hayley Atwell
short_description: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a Super-Soldier serum. But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
stars: Chris Evans, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson, Robert Redford
short_description: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and Shield agent, the Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

name: Daredevil
stars: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Garner, Colin Farrell, Michael Clarke Duncan
short_description: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

name: Deadpool
stars: Ryan Reynolds, Morena Baccarin, T.J. Miller, Ed Skrein
short_description: A former Special Forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopting the alter ego Deadpool.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy
stars: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper, Zoe Saldana
short_description: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

name: Hulk
stars: Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Sam Elliott, Josh Lucas
short_description: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

name: Iron Man
stars: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges
short_description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, an engineer creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

name: Kick-Ass
stars: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Nicolas Cage, ChloÃ« Grace Moretz, Garrett M. Brown
short_description: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a super-hero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

name: Man of Steel
stars: Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon, Diane Lane
short_description: Clark Kent, one of the last of an extinguished race disguised as an unremarkable human, is forced to reveal his identity when Earth is invaded by an army of survivors who threaten to bring the planet to the brink of destruction.

name: Spider-Man
stars: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco
short_description: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
stars: Megan Fox, Will Arnett, William Fichtner, Noel Fisher
short_description: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.

name: The Avengers
stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner
short_description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
